item.title: Shore Leave
item.description: A dialed-in adaptation of the Daiquiri No. 3 that provides clean coconut notes and a saline boost to help you pretend you’re at back at your favorite beach. 1 ½ oz Coconut Oil-washed unaged ‘White’ Rum/Rhum ¼ oz Luxardo Maraschino ½ oz Salted Grapefruit Cordial ½ oz lime juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a large basil leaf, pressing it into your palms before placement to release its oils.

item.title: Shieldmaiden
item.description: Cocktail An adventurous Nordic-inspired riff on the Gimlet that incorporates the gentle cooling qualities of sage into the harsher tones of caraway and citrus. 1 oz Aquavit* 1 oz London Dry Gin** 1 oz Lemon-Sage Cordial ¼ oz lemon juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a floating lemon wheel and a sage leaf. *Recommended: Linie, Krogstad **Recommended: Fords, Bombay Dry, Broker’s

item.title: Junction Paloma
item.description: Cocktail Salty, refreshing and effervescent, this non-traditional take on the Mexican classic is sure to be a crowd-pleaser. 1 ½ oz 100% Agave Blanco Tequila* ½ oz Aperol ½ oz lime juice ¾ oz Salted Grapefruit Cordial 1 oz still water Assemble all ingredients, add ice, then carbonate**. Shake, then strain into a champagne flute. No garnish. * Recommended: Lunazul Blanco, Altos Olmeca Blanco, Espolòn Blanco, Herradura Silver ** Note: I use the Perlini Cocktail Cabonation System.

item.title: Farmers Tan
item.description: Cocktail A refreshingly acidic pick-me-up to ease you through the hottest days of Summer. 2 oz Lemongrass-infused Corn Moonshine* 1 oz Watermelon Shrub ¾ oz lemon juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a floating lime wheel. *Recommended: Belle Isle Moonshine Lemongrass-infused Corn Moonshine 750ml bottle Corn Moonshine 8 stalks of lemongrass Slice the lemongrass into small pieces, then combine with the Moonshine in a quart-sized Mason jar and let infuse for three days, agitating daily.

item.title: The Age of Sail
item.description: Cocktail A boozy cane spirit cocktail with a delicate floral essence and complex undertones of bittersweet citrus. 1 ½ oz Haitian Rhum* 1 ½ oz Contratto Bianco ¼ oz Amaro Montenegro shy ¼ oz Pomegranate Grenadine 3 dashes (3 ml) Angostura Bitters Add all ingredients to a mixing glass, add ice, gently stir until properly chilled. Strain into chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange peel, taking care to express the citrus oil over the edge and stem of the glass, and across the surface of the drink.
